Considering its worth and benefits, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $95. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested or if you have any questions. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
